summary:
THIS DOES NOT REPLACE CHILD VOICE- yet

Here are 4 folders with WMA and WAV sound files in them for a potential follow/adopt. You can use them but only on Nexus and Steam please ^^ You only need to credit me, you don't have to ask me for permission to use this.
descriptionHtml:
[b]THIS DOES NOT, I REPEAT, DOES NOT REPLACE THE CHILDREN'S VOICE(S) AT ALL. THIS IS JUST A MODDER'S RESOURCE, WHICH ONLY INCLUDES FOLDERS WITH VOICE FILES IN THEM.[/b]








[size=3]now that we got that over with,[/size]
Here are 4 folders with WMA and WAV sound files in them for a potential follower/adoptable child. You can use them but only on Nexus and Steam please ^^ You only need to credit me for da voice, you don't have to ask me for permission. I can voice more if you ask me, please send lines. c: I can voice more if you ask me, please send me lines. So basically, if you need me for anything that involves voicing in a high-pitchy range, then message me and I'll be happy to help ٩(˘◡˘)۶



Planning on making a custom voiced child follower but having trouble in creation kit. Any help would be appreciated as I'm literally freaking out after watching tons and tutorials. I need help I think I'm going insane (っ❀ₒ❀)っ



if you'd like to hear a sample : https://www.soundcloud.com/bunnipop
author: bunnipop
